# Ignore Visual Studio files
.vs/
*.vscode/
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates
*.userprefs
*.csproj.user
*.cache

# Ignore build output
/bin/
/obj/

# Ignore NuGet packages
/packages/

# Ignore Visual Studio debugger configuration
.vsconfig

# Ignore ReSharper files
_ReSharper*/

# Ignore temporary files
*.~*

# Ignore files generated by Rider
.idea/

# Ignore Visual Studio Code files
.vscode/

# Ignore any local configuration file
appsettings.json

# Ignore Visual Studio test log manifest
testlog.manifest

# Ignore Visual Studio test log files
*.testlog

# Ignore project settings JSON files
*.settings.json

# Ignore SQLite database files
*.sqllite


# Ignore Visual Studio workspace state file
VSWorkspaceState.json
